titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the American Broach and Machine Company records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: American Broach and Machine Company (Ann Arbor, Mich.)

did.unittitle: American Broach and Machine Company records

archdesc.scopecontent: Materials collected by company attorneys relating to the organization of employees and subsequent strike at the Ann Arbor , Michigan plant; include legal documents, organizational material, news clippings, and union newsletters.
